name: omniinvest-financial-app
description: Elite Investment Intelligence Platform - Track insider trades, analyze investment moves, and make smarter investment decisions

scripts.deploy: npm run optimize && npm run build && echo 'Optimized build complete. Ready for deployment.'
scripts.analyze: npm run build && npx vite-bundle-analyzer dist/stats.html
scripts.build:pwa: npm run build && npm run generate-sw
scripts.test:cross-platform: npm run build && npm run serve:https
scripts.optimize: npm run lint && npm run type-check
scripts.perf: npm run build && npm run preview -- --open
